feed.title: 追踪精彩列表每日更新
feed.subtitle: 我们跟踪 500 多个精彩列表更新，您还可以通过 RSS 或新闻通讯订阅每日或每周更新。

entry.title: 精彩列表更新于 2023 年 9 月 16 日
entry.content:
1. 很棒的数据科学

免费课程

  • MLSys-NYU-2022 (⭐163) - 纽约大学 Tandon 金融机器学习课程的幻灯片、脚本和材料，2022 年。
  • 动手训练和部署 ML (⭐447) - 训练和部署可预测加密货币价格的无服务器 API 的动手课程。

2. 很棒的 Mongodb

库/Python

  • AtlasQ (⭐5) - 使用 MongoEngine 语法的 MongoDB Atlas 搜索包装器
  • Flask-MongoEngine (⭐830) - 集成了 MongoEngine、WTForms 和 FlaskDebugToolbar 的 Flask 扩展

3.很棒的自托管

软件/杂项

  • Flipt - 支持多个数据后端的功能标志解决方案（替代 LaunchDarkly）。 （演示，源代码（⭐2.8k） ） GPL-3.0 Docker/K8S/Go

4. 出色的事件响应

IR 工具集 / 内存分析工具

  • [MemProcFS] ( https://github.com/ufrisk/MemProcFS (⭐2.2k) ) - MemProcFS 是一种将物理内存视为虚拟文件系统中的文件的简单便捷的方法。

5. 很棒的 Graphql

杂项/反应

  • goctopus (⭐68) - 一个非常快的 GraphQL 发现和指纹识别工具箱。

帖子/反应

  • 如何测试您的 GraphQL 端点

教程/反应

  • GraphQL Security Academy - 一个免费的交互式平台，用于学习 GraphQL 安全性：如何查找、利用和修复 GraphQL 漏洞。

6. 很棒的Cpp

CSV

  • ssp (⭐40) - 一个仅标头的“csv”解析器，它快速且具有现代 C++ API 的多功能性。 [麻省理工学院]

集成开发环境

  • Anjuta DevStudio - GNOME IDE。 [GPL3]
;
entry.summary: 2023 年 9 月 16 日更新的 6 个精彩列表，包括 Awesome Datascience、Awesome Mongodb、Awesome Selfhosted、Awesome Incident Response、Awesome Graphql、Awesome Cpp

entry.title: 精彩列表更新于 2023 年 9 月 15 日
entry.content:
1. 很棒的Vite

与框架无关的插件/捆绑

  • vite-plugin-cdn2 (⭐39) - 用 CDN 替换模块。

2. 伟大的戈多

插件和脚本 / 各种 Godot 版本

  • Orchestrator (⭐22) - 用于 2D 和 3D 游戏的对话和可视化脚本子系统 (Godot 4.x)。

3. 很棒的 Playcanvas

扩展和实用程序

  • 8th Wall - 无标记 AR 运行时。

4. 很棒的素食主义

鞋

  • 阿迪达斯- 各种型号的纯素鞋。

5. 很棒的电子

开源/其他

  • PikaTorrent (⭐152) - BitTorrent 客户端。

6. 很棒的 Swift Playgrounds

WWDC 学生提交的材料

  • 2022 (⭐49)

7. 很棒的 Micropython

存储/数据库

  • micropg_lite (⭐1) - MicroPython 的 PostgreSQL 数据库驱动程序，基于 micropg，但旨在需要更少的内存，但在功能上做了一些妥协。

8. 很棒的围棋

用 Go 实现的数据库

  • LinDB (⭐2.7k) - LinDB 是一个可扩展、高性能、高可用性的分布式时间序列数据库。

9. 很棒的审计算法

论文 / 2023

  • 对 YouTube 上的兔子洞进行建模- (SNAM)对 YouTube 上的兔子洞中用户的陷阱动态进行建模，并提供对该封闭空间的测量。
  • 审核 YouTube 的推荐算法是否存在错误信息过滤气泡-（推荐系统上的交易）如何“戳破气泡”，即从推荐中恢复气泡外壳。

论文 / 2020

  • 审计激进化路径- (FAT*)使用静态渠道推荐上的随机游走来研究激进渠道彼此之间的可达性。

10. 很棒的 Graphql

类型/反应

  • graphql-to-type (⭐0) - 完全用 TypeScript 的类型系统编写的 GraphQL 查询解析器，用于根据提供的查询创建接口

11. 金融领域出色的人工智能

法学硕士

  • 法学硕士实践：训练和部署实时财务顾问 (⭐113) - 使用 Falcon 7B 和 CometLLM 训练和部署实时财务顾问聊天机器人。

12. 很棒的铁锈

应用程序/加密货币

  • wagyu (⭐580) [ wagyu ] — 用于生成加密货币钱包的 Rust 库

应用程序/游戏

  • maras-archive/rsnake (⭐107) — 用 Rust 编写的 Snake。

应用程序/系统工具

  • eza-community/eza (⭐680) — 'ls' 的替代品
;
entry.summary: 2023 年 9 月 15 日更新的 12 个精彩列表，包括 Awesome Vite、Awesome Godot、Awesome Playcanvas、Awesome Veganism、Awesome Electron、Awesome Swift Playgrounds、Awesome Micropython、Awesome Go、Awesome Audit Algorithms、Awesome Graphql、Awesome Ai in Finance、Awesome Rust

entry.title: Awesome List Updated on Sep 13, 2023
entry.content:
1. Awesome Integration

Projects / API Management

  • Gravitee.io API Management (⭐54) (⭐49) - A flexible, lightweight, and open-source API management solution that provides comprehensive API management capabilities and helps you manage your APIs with ease.
  • WSO2 API Manager (⭐759) (⭐756) - A fully open-source API management platform that provides comprehensive API management capabilities and allows you to manage APIs with ease.

Projects / API Design

  • OpenAPI Diff (⭐646) (⭐642) - Compare OpenAPI specs with version control and visualize the differences in HTML or Markdown format.
  • OpenAPI Style Validator (⭐174) (⭐172) - Ensure that your OpenAPI specs meet your organization's standards with this flexible and customizable style validator.

Projects / API Documentation

  • OpenAPI Explorer (⭐224) (⭐222) - A tool for generating user interfaces from OpenAPI specifications, making it easier for software engineers to visualize and interact with APIs.

Projects / API Gateway

  • Apinto (⭐932) (⭐925) - A Golang-based microservice gateway that provides dynamic routing, service orchestration, multi-tenancy management, and API access control.
  • Ocelot (⭐7.8k) (⭐7.8k) - A .NET API Gateway that provides a simple and elegant way to manage APIs with its intuitive routing and middleware configuration.

Projects / API Testing

  • MQ clients
    • JMSToolBox (⭐178) (⭐177) - Universal JMS client designed to interact with a wide range of JMS-based message brokers.
    • kcat (⭐4.9k) (⭐4.9k) - Generic non-JVM producer and consumer for Apache Kafka, functioning as a netcat for Kafka.
    • MQTT Explorer (⭐2.4k) (⭐2.5k) - All-round MQTT client with a structured topic overview, suitable for debugging and testing MQTT-based systems.
    • Offset Explorer - GUI application for managing and using Apache Kafka clusters, formerly known as Kafka Tool.
    • Service Bus Explorer (⭐1.8k) (⭐1.8k) - GUI app for Azure Service Bus, offering advanced features like import/export functionality and the ability to test topic, queues, subscriptions, relay services, notification hubs, and events hubs.
  • Mocking tools
    • Microcks (⭐932) (⭐928) - Open-source Kubernetes-native tool for API mocking and testing, supporting AsyncAPI, OpenAPI, Postman Collections, etc.
    • Mockable - Simple configurable service to mock out RESTful API or SOAP web-services.
    • Mockoon (⭐5.3k) (⭐5.3k) - Easy-to-use tool for designing and running mock REST APIs.
    • MockServer (⭐4.2k) (⭐4.3k) - Easy mocking of any system you integrate with via HTTP or HTTPS.
    • Mocky (⭐1.9k) (⭐2k) - Free and unlimited online service for generating custom HTTP responses.
    • Prism (⭐3.7k) (⭐3.7k) - Open-source HTTP mock server that can mimic your API's behavior as if you already built it.
    • WireMock (⭐5.7k) (⭐5.7k) - Mock your APIs for fast, robust, and comprehensive testing.

Projects / Messaging

  • Eclipse Mosquitto (⭐7.7k) (⭐7.7k) - A lightweight open-source message broker that implements the MQTT protocol. Designed for low-power devices and supports message encryption and authentication.
  • RabbitMQ (⭐11k) (⭐11k) - An open-source message broker that implements AMQP and supports multiple messaging protocols and patterns. Offers reliable and efficient message delivery and supports clustering and high availability.

Projects / Workflow engine

  • Activiti (⭐9.6k) (⭐9.6k) - A lightweight and Java-centric open-source engine for executing BPMN (Business Process Model and Notation) workflows.
  • Camunda (⭐3.5k) (⭐3.5k) - An open-source workflow and decision automation platform that helps you automate business processes and decisions in a flexible and scalable way.
  • Conductor (⭐10k) (⭐10k) - A cloud-based orchestration engine designed to run and manage workflows in a microservices architecture.
  • Temporal (⭐8k) (⭐8k) - An open-source platform that uses a workflow-as-code approach to make your applications more reliable and scalable.

Resources / Protocols

  • OpenMessaging (⭐281) (⭐282) - A cloud native, vendor-neutral open specification for distributed messaging.

We'll also explore some of the new full stack UI features that Blazor offers in .NET 8 RC1. Community links .

9. Awesome Veganism

  • Amsterdam, Netherlands
    • Koffie Ende Koeck - Small vegan cafe, with nice brunch, and awesome vegan high tea.

    • Vegan Junk Food Bar - High quality burgers, fancy hotdogs, Dutch specialties like Bitterballen, cocktails, and more.
    • Yemayá's Vegan Corner - Super tasty food driven by sustainable local community efforts.
  • Duisburg, Germany
    • Falafel 1001 - Amazing arabic dishes, delicious ingredients and spices, big portions, and very good prices.
    • Krümelküche - Cosy place with a nice selection of main dishes, burgers, cakes, and good drinks.
  • Essen, Germany
    • Peace Food - Relaxed atmosphere, big selection of really good vietnamese dishes, and offering refreshing home-made drinks.

Resources / Tools

    Use this tool to define a list of payment pointers and their weights. Then, add the generated monetization link element to your site. The link will contain a unique URL hosted on https://webmonetization.org/api/revshare/pay/ . If you'd prefer to not use a hosted URL, you can set up revshare by adding a script to your site.

  • Paytrackr (⭐0) - (Forked from wobsoriano/paytrackr ) - Track and manage your micropayments into one place.

    PayTrackr is the easiest and safest way to track and manage your micropayments to web monetized websites, having a web monetization provider membership.

  • Open Monetization Wallet (⭐11) - Tools for managing your vanity Web Monetization wallet.

    Open Monetization Wallet (OMW) makes it easier to accept payments with the Web Monetization API at scale. Some features:

    • Custom wallet URLs: own your own "Payment Pointer", eg $wallet.signalnerve.com, instead of $pay.stronghold.co/abcdef123
    • Change between wallets/providers with no downtime
    • Logs of incoming payment requests
    • Revenue sharing between multiple wallets, eg for multiple team members
    • Infinitely scalable with serverless technology
    • Free and open-source

  • Darcs - Cross-platform version control system, like git, mercurial or svn but with a very different approach: focus on changes rather than snapshots. ( Source Code ) GPL-2.0 Haskell
  • Fossil - Distributed version control with built-in wiki and bug tracking. ( Source Code ) BSD-2-Clause C
  • Git - Distributed revision control and source code management (SCM) with an emphasis on speed. ( Source Code (⭐47k) ) GPL-2.0 C
  • Subversion - Client-server revision control system. ( Source Code ) Apache-2.0 C

Software / Virtualization

  • XCP-ng - Virtualization platform based on Xen Source and Citrix® Hypervisor (formerly XenServer). ( Source Code ) GPL-2.0 C

List of Licenses / Web

  • BUSL-1.1 - Business Source License 1.1
  • CDDL-1.0 - Common Development and Distribution License 1.0
  • EPL-1.0 - Eclipse Public License 1.0
  • GFDL-1.2 - GNU Free Documentation License 1.2
  • NLPL - No Limit Public License
  • QPL-1.0 - Q Public License 1.0
  • Vim - Vim License

9. Awesome Vite

Framework-agnostic Plugins / Integrations

  • vite-plugin-json-server (⭐0) - A seamless integration of JSON Server library.

Framework-agnostic Plugins / Loaders

  • unplugin-vue-images (⭐1) - Use the image resource as a component.

Framework-agnostic Plugins / Bundling

  • unplugin-zip-pack (⭐0) - Zip your dist with filter function support.

Framework-agnostic Plugins / Transformers

  • vite-plugin-html-injection (⭐2) - Inject HTML, JavaScript and CSS code snippets into the index.html .

Framework-agnostic Plugins / Helpers

  • vite-plugin-module-list (⭐0) - Automatically import the modules found in a specified folder.

Vue / Integrations

  • @vitejs/plugin-vue (⭐297) - Official Vue 3 support.

React / Routing

  • generouted (⭐608) - Client-side type-safe file-based routing and global modals — supports layouts, loaders, code-splitting and more.

React / SSG

  • vite-react-ssg (⭐5) - Static-site generation for React.

Solid / Routing

  • generouted (⭐608) - Client-side type-safe file-based routing and global modals — supports layouts, loaders, code-splitting and more.

entry.summary: 9 awesome list updated on Sep 04, 2023, including Awesome Ant Design, Awesome Ebpf, Awesome Embedded Rust, Awesome Zsh Plugins, Awesome Nix, Awesome Fp Js, Awesome Tailwindcss, Awesome Sysadmin, Awesome Vite

entry.title: Awesome List Updated on Sep 03, 2023
entry.content:
1. Awesome Engineering Team Management

Engineering / Technology

  • “Software development is more akin to the product design and development phase of industrial production than to the manufacturing.” ( source ) - This quote is from a review of Superdistribution - Objects as Property on the Electronic Frontier , in which the creator of Objective-C was advocating in the 90's for a new economic framework that rewards creation of components in proportion to their use. But software production is not like manufacturing of widgets in a factory. A (software) object is not an (hardware) widget .

2. Mind Expanding Books

Autobiographies and Biographies

  • Name: A Sense of the World

    Author: Jason Roberts

    Goodreads Rating: 4.10

    Year Published: 2005

3. Awesome Nlg

Neural Natural Language Generation

  • lightnlg (⭐3) - A minimalistic codebase for finetuning and interacting with NLG models using PyTorch Lightning.

4. Awesome Security

Network / Scanning / Pentesting

  • Cognito Scanner (⭐20) - CLI tool to pentest Cognito AWS instance. It implements three attacks: unwanted account creation, account oracle and identity pool escalation

Network / Monitoring / Logging

  • Substation (⭐202) - Substation is a cloud native data pipeline and transformation toolkit written in Go.

Network / IDS / IPS / Host IDS / Host IPS

  • DrKeithJones.com - A blog on cyber security and network security monitoring.

EBooks / Online resources

  • Node.js Secure Coding: Defending Against Command Injection Vulnerabilities - Learn secure coding conventions in Node.js by executing command injection attacks on real-world npm packages and analyzing vulnerable code.

5. Awesome Zsh Plugins

zinit-4

  • AppImage distribution (release link),
  • Action complete – press Alt-Shift-A and Alt-Shift-C to complete plugin names and ice modifiers,
  • Themes – set $ZITHEME to one of default, blue and gold to set a color set to use for Zinit 4 messages,
  • New ice build which is equivalent of three other ices: null , configure and make install and simply builds the project from sources, with support for autotools/CMake/Meson/Scons.

Generic ZSH

  • A Guide to ZSH Completion With Examples - Explains ZSH autocompletion configuration with examples.

6. Awesome Langchain

Other LLM Frameworks / Videos Playlists

  • Embedbase (⭐414) : The native Software 3.0 stack for building AI-powered applications.

7. Awesome Go

ORM

  • go-dbw (⭐8) - A simple package that encapsulates database operations.

8. Awesome Game Remakes

Racing

  • wipEout Rewrite (⭐2.1k) - This is a re-implementation of the 1995 PSX game wipEout.

战略

  • KeeperFX (⭐303) - Open source remake and Fan Expansion of Dungeon Keeper.
  • Ozymandias (⭐35) - An open source re-implementation of Pharaoh in the Julius/Augustus engine.
;
entry.summary: 8 awesome list updated on Sep 03, 2023, including Awesome Engineering Team Management, Mind Expanding Books, Awesome Nlg, Awesome Security, Awesome Zsh Plugins, Awesome Langchain, Awesome Go, Awesome Game Remakes
